post.title: Neena Makurano Officially Terminated from Production Kawaii
post.content:
Fans were surprised to learn that Neena Makurano of Production Kawaii—who was originally set to graduate on August 2nd—has had her contract terminated by the agency on June 3rd. In an official statement, Production Kawaii management has said that they discovered Neena was involved in actions causing a breach of contract, such as leaking confidential information, leaking false information including slander, and involvement in VTuber activities aside from those in Kawaii which violates their exclusivity clause.

Important Announcement

Dear Kawaii fans,
We are extremely sorry to inform you that we had to terminate the contract with our affiliated Vtuber, “Neena Makurano”.
Please read the official announcement below for the details. pic.twitter.com/tHpyIEdDpk

— production kawaii official (@kawaiiOfficial5) June 3, 2022

node.description: Cosplay Mania 2022, an annual cosplay convention in the Philippines, is set to host Hololive Indonesia's Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie this October.
